can you hear me

SpeakText.Text: Yes, I can hear you fine; Yeah, I hear you; Yeah, I can hear your voice;Yes I can hear you;Yes I can hear you perfectly;I can hear you perfectly;I can hear you;I hear you fine;I can hear you fine;Yeah!;Yeah! All good!;Yeah, your microphone is good
